```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle", fill = "#e4e4e4", height = "15px"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px"))

wk_post <- tibble(
  

"Data Camp" = c(unchecked,
            unchecked,
            checked),

"eCampus" = c(unchecked,
        checked,
        unchecked),

"R" = c(checked,
        checked,
        unchecked),

"Slack" = c(unchecked, 
              unchecked, 
              unchecked),

Description = c("Read a couple papers",
                "Create two bad and one good visualization in Base R",
                "Complete two modules"),

Location = c("[Link](/readings/02-readings/#read-things)",
             "[Link](/assignment/02-assignment/#create-plots-in-base-r-1)",
             "[Link](https://www.datacamp.com/){target='_blank'}")

)
```
